alert.note: Alert for Henderson; Van Zandt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 05 at 11:51AM CDT until May 05 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Henderson and Van Zandt Counties. * WHEN...Until 300 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will likely cause urban and small stream flooding. Low lying and/or poor drainage areas will experience minor flooding in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Athens, Gun Barrel City, Canton, Wills Point, Grand Saline, Mabank, Chandler, Van, Malakoff, Tool, Seven Points, Edgewood, Brownsboro, Eustace, Berryville, Trinidad, Fruitvale, Edom, Enchanted Oaks and Coffee City.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
